head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DUFFY, MICHAEL J., PHD.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DUFFY, MICHAEL J., PHD.

block.p: DUFFY-Michael J., PhD. Of Bronxville, NY, and Mattituck, NY, on September 21, 2000. Husband of Judith Crabtree Duffy, father of Maura, Justine and Myles. Calling hours at Fred H. Mc Grath & Son Funeral Home, Bronxville between the hrs of 7-9PM, Saturday, 1-5PM Sunday. Mass of Christian Burial, St. Joseph's Church, Bronxville on Monday, September 25 at 10 AM. Interment Cutchogue, NY.
